name: Office Intruders
description:
Office Intruders

Hey, you! Yeah, you! I have a mission for you : find the intruder!

It's quite simple, you'll see! We have a whole lot of cameras for you to spy on our dear employees with.

If someone doesn't fit the mold, please click on their camera and they'll be fired right away.

But be careful! Because we don't like mistakes here...

You get ONLY ONE shot! And ONLY ONE minute to decide!

You need to find them and fire them... until there is ONLY ONE employee left!

That's it, you know everything.

Game Made by Kitty Factory

Texts: @amethystworld

Music: frankum  https://freesound.org/people/frankum/sounds/339498/
